abstract: General Electric said Monday it would purchase the Hydril pressure control business, a unit of a steel tube supplier, Tenaris for $1.12 billion to expand its oil and gas business.
lead_paragraph: General Electric said Monday it would purchase the Hydril pressure control business, a unit of a steel tube supplier, Tenaris for $1.12 billion to expand its oil and gas business.

headline.main: G.E. Dives for Tenaris Hydril Unit
